description: The AP-06 RTO is located in Amalapuram and serves the Konaseema region of Andhra Pradesh. Although the state transitioned to a centralized registration system (AP-39/AP-40) in 2019, the AP-06 code remains valid for existing registrations and historical records handled by the Amalapuram office.
address: Regional Transport Office, Amalapuram, Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Konaseema District, Andhra Pradesh
